Uses of Class
game.actors.Merchant

Packages that use Merchant
Package Description
game.actions.trading  
game.actors  

  • Uses of Merchant in game.actions.trading

    Fields in game.actions.trading with type parameters of type Merchant
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Map<Merchant,​java.util.ArrayList<Item>> TradeManager.merchantItemList
    a map of merchants to the items that they sell
    private java.util.Map<Merchant,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>>> TradeManager.merchantPriceList
    a map of maps, that maps merchants to their own price lists(list of items and their buy,sell prices)
    private java.util.Map<Merchant,​java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem>> TradeManager.merchantWeaponList
    a map of merchants to the weapons that they sell
    private java.util.ArrayList<Merchant> TradeManager.swappers
    list of registered swappers(merchants that can perform a swap action)
    Methods in game.actions.trading with parameters of type Merchant
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList TradeManager.checkForPurchases​(Merchant merchant)
    returns an Action list of Buy actions for each item/weapon that the merchant can sell
    ActionList TradeManager.checkForSales​(Merchant merchant)
    returns an Action list of sell actions for each registered item/weapon that the player is holding
    ActionList TradeManager.checkForSwaps​(Merchant merchant)
    returns an Action list of swap actions for each registered swappable that the player is holding
    ActionList TradeManager.checkForTrades​(Merchant merchant)
    checks which actions the player can perform with the merchant
    void TradeManager.registerMerchant​(Merchant merchant, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> priceList, java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> weaponList, java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemList)
    maps the priceList, the weaponList and the itemList to the merchant
    void TradeManager.registerSwapper​(Merchant merchant)
    registers the swapper with TradeManager
